com.barryholroyd.bluetoothchattechdemo.support

Class Toaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.barryholroyd.bluetoothchattechdemo.support.Toaster

  • class Toaster
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to displayShort toasts from either the foreground or the background.
